text: The Ark was a rock band from Rottne in Sweden, active between 1991 and 2011. Started up by vocalist and priest-son Ola Salo, the band participated at Eurovision Song Contest 2007 with the song The Worrying Kind. ==Discography== ===Albums=== *2000 – We Are The Ark *2002 – In Lust We Trust *2004 – State of the Ark *2007 – Prayer for the Weekend *2010 – In Full Regalia *2011 – Arkeology == References == ==Other websites== Ark
title: The Ark
